001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.cart_discount;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.stream.Collectors;
006
007import com.commercetools.api.models.common.CentPrecisionMoney;
008
009public interface CartDiscountValueFixedMixin extends GenericCartDiscountValueMixin<CartDiscountValueFixedDraft> {
010    public List<CentPrecisionMoney> getMoney();
011
012    @Override
013    default CartDiscountValueFixedDraft toDraft() {
014        return toDraftBuilder().build();
015    }
016
017    @Override
018    default CartDiscountValueFixedDraftBuilder toDraftBuilder() {
019        return CartDiscountValueFixedDraft.builder()
020                .money(this.getMoney().stream().map(CentPrecisionMoney::toDraft).collect(Collectors.toList()));
021    }
022}
